document_data.caption: Typical hide armor.
document_data.name: Hide armor
document_data.mainbody: '''Hide armor''' was a type of armor used on [[Toril]].
document_data.Description: Hide armor was made from animal skins, pelts and furs.  It was thicker and heavier than [[leather armor]].  Although hard to move in, hide armor was not so thick as to hinder speed.
document_data.Materials:
The hides of [[bear]]s, [[griffon]]s and [[dragon]]s were commonly used for such armor.

In [[Chult]], [[velociraptor]] hide was used for crafting sturdy and flexible hide armor that was in high demand among [[rangers]].{{Template:Cite game/Tales from Candlekeep: Tomb of Annihilation}}
document_data.History: [[saurial|Lacerials]] introduced the idea of hide armor to the [[Nubari]] inhabitants of [[Malatra]].{{Cite polyhedron/129/Agriculture, Invention, and Society in Malatra|31}}

Notable Users.Classes:
* [[Barbarian]] tribes often dressed in hide armor.
* [[Druid]]s often dressed in hide armor.
